attributes.action: Close all educational settings for 14 days
attributes.additional_details: This will ascertain to had the virus and slow the spread of COVID , it will also downtime the time we have to quarantine for if many are proved to have COVID or COVID symptoms they stay home . Those who don’t can resume back to educational settings .
attributes.background: To shut all educational settings for 14 days , and anyone who has symptoms to stay home thereafter.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Implement a two week school lockdown before 24 December to save Christmas
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015

All nurseries and places of education to stay closed after Xmas to 15 January
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561988
